## slu k8s token

Get token for ServiceAccount

```
slu k8s token [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                     help for token
      --json                     Format output to JSON
  -n, --namespace string         Kubernetes Namespace
  -s, --service-account string   Kubernetes ServiceAccount (default "default")
```
